Summary: Strange wobbling sphere and Cylinder during encounter
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Brazil
There were no other sightings in Brazil on or around March 8th 2007
divs: sighting detailson march 8, 2007, at approximately 13:11 pm (easter standard time), i was returning home from lunch and noticed several jets creating contrail in the sky. it was at this point that i noticed a spherical object hovering and bobbing in the n\e sky. the object was shining brightly in the blue sky, but i noticed its wobbling i would often see a dark undercarriage. additionally, the sphere was moving very slowly and then looked to be stationary. at this point, i pulled my vehicle into the first baptist church parking lot and observed the sphere. the parking lot is on the corner of ridge and walnut, i was going east on ridge. additionally, the object was positioned in the n\e sky. i though the sphere might have been a balloon let go, but it seemed somewhat larger and brighter than what one might expect and something did not seem right about how it wobbled. i exited my vehicle and observed the object for approximately another 3-4 minutes. the sphere appeared to be hovering while i looked n\e. i continued to walk towards the sphere hoping to get a better look. unfortunately, i was not able to find anyone who could also observer this sphere in my general area. at approximately 13:14 pm (eastern standard time), i noted something shoot off of the sphere. this object seemed to by cylindrical in shape and was wobbling itself, but moved slightly quicker than the original sphere. within a few seconds, i lost sight of this object (faded out of sight?). at approximately 13:16 pm (eastern standard time), i lost sight of the sphere. i scanned the sky for a few more minutes, but the object was no longer visible. at this point, i returned to my vehicle. at this point, i am unsure of what i witnessed. it was probably terrestrial, but it certainly caught my attention. in fact, it reminded me of the videos of the mexican ufo���s and the grainy footage of military test objects viewed in florida. if you have any questions feel free to contact me via phone or mailing, but i would prefer to remain anonymous at this juncture.i was surprised to see the object, but was more curious than frightened. i am sure there is some logical explanation for this event. thank you, s. harris
